amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Secretary from canceling, deferring or withdrawing any lease previously announced to be auctioned based on public comments received by the Department after the public comment period has expired.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in House Report 113-493 to prohibit the Secretary from canceling, deferring or withdrawing any lease previously announced to be auctioned based on public comments received by the Department after the public comment period has expired.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 173 (Roll no. 365).
